name: sakhee
description: AI-powered PCOS Management Assistant for Indian Women
author: supriyavikramsingh-sudo

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=server
